Token.Abstract: This NSString class category adds methods for evaluating expressions directly from NSString instances.
Evaluates the receiver as an expression returning an object.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the receiver as an object expression.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the receiver as an expression returning a string.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the receiver as a string expression.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the receiver as an expression returning a numeric value.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the receiver as a numeric expression.

Token.Abstract: Evaluates the receiver as an expression returning a boolean value.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The result of evaluating the receiver as a boolean expression.

Token.Abstract: Returns an expression usable for referencing the MBML variable whose name is contained in the receiver.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A Mockingbird expression usable for referencing the variable named by the receiver.
